meta.description: Minimize the rental fees for warehouse space over a 4-month period with varying contract lengths and discounts.

sets.name: CONTRACT_PERIODS
sets.description: Possible contract rental periods in months

params.name: required_area
params.description: Required warehouse area for each month

params.name: rental_fee
params.description: Rental fee per m^2 for each contract period

vars.name: x
vars.description: Area rented in month m for a contract period of p months

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(rental_fee[p] * x[m][p] for m in MONTHS for p in CONTRACT_PERIODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total rental cost over all months and contract periods

constraints.name: satisfy_demand_month_1
constraints.description: Satisfy the warehouse area demand for month 1

constraints.name: satisfy_demand_month_2
constraints.description: Satisfy the warehouse area demand for month 2

constraints.name: satisfy_demand_month_3
constraints.description: Satisfy the warehouse area demand for month 3

constraints.name: satisfy_demand_month_4
constraints.description: Satisfy the warehouse area demand for month 4
